item.title: Let's Celebrate The Female Side Of Tech
item.description: It is Ada Lovelace Day today, and to support the women in technology, bloggers all over the world are celebrating the female side of tech. What do I mean? You may not know it from the throngs of hairy guys at tech events, but not only are there women in tech, they have done a lot to make YOUR life easier. Let’s review a couple current ladies of technology that have been rocking my world.
